ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Neolithic Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make basic neolithic production benches with faster work speed compared to spots.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Neolithic Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make advanced neolithic production benches with faster work speed compared to basic benches.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Medieval Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to make medieval production benches with faster work speed compared to their neolithic predecessors.
